mapper.insert: INSERT INTO d_business_member (email, password, name, phone_num, business_num, opening_day, is_delete, dt_insert, dt_update, insert_user, update_user) VALUE (#{email}, #{password}, #{name}, #{phone_num}, #{business_num}, #{opening_day}, 'N', NOW(), NOW(), #{insert_user}, #{update_user})
mapper.update: UPDATE d_business_member SET email = #{email}, name = #{name}, phone_num = #{phone_num}, business_num = #{business_num}, opening_day = #{opening_day}, update_user = #{update_user}, dt_update = NOW() WHERE business_user_num = #{business_user_num}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM d_business_member WHERE business_user_num = #{business_user_num} AND is_delete = 'N'
mapper.update: UPDATE d_business_member SET is_delete = 'Y', dt_update = NOW() WHERE business_user_num = #{business_user_num}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO d_business_delete (business_user_num, content, insert_user, dt_insert) VALUE (#{business_user_num}, #{reason}, #{insert_user}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT business_num FROM d_business_member WHERE business_num = #{business_num} AND is_delete = 'N'
